title: ExpenseWatch Chosen by Unicorn HRO as Preferred Spend Management Solution
text:
Unicorn HRO, an industry leader offering fully integrated and configurable HR Solutions, including Human Resources, Payroll, Benefits and Insurance, has chosen ExpenseWatch, a leading spend management solutions provider, to be its preferred partner for expense and spend management software.
Plymouth Meeting, PA (PRWEB) October 12, 2015
Unicorn HRO, an industry leader offering fully integrated and configurable HR Solutions, including Human Resources, Payroll, Benefits and Insurance, has chosen ExpenseWatch, a leading spend management solutions provider, to be its preferred partner for expense and spend management software.
“We evaluated a number of expense management solutions and chose ExpenseWatch because we believe it offers our customers the most robust expense reporting tool for the best price,” said Timothy Diassi, executive vice president and general manager at Unicorn HRO. “Automating expense and spend management processes enables companies to control and manage a top spend area, while increasing employee morale with faster expense reimbursements through integrations with our payroll software.”
“We are pleased to be working with Unicorn HRO to enable our customers to continue to automate key business processes using Unicorn HRO’s human resource management solutions, including payroll, employee benefits and more,” said Bill Vergantino, president and CEO of ExpenseWatch. “We are committed to helping our customers succeed and we can do so by offering complementary products and services, like Unicorn HRO, which we believe will help them continue to save both time and money, and support their efforts to grow.”
The alliance will enable each company to offer its respective clients best-of-breed solutions for expense and spend management and human resources automation.
About Unicorn HRO ( http://www.UnicornHRO.com )
Founded in 1982 with its headquarters in Florham Park, N.J., Unicorn HRO specializes in fully integrated benefits, payroll, and human resource solutions. With industry-leading client retention, Unicorn HRO currently services the HR needs of more than 900 domestic and international companies representing over one million employees. Unicorn HRO LLC has offices in Durham, NC, Seattle, WA, Houston and Dallas, TX. For more information, visit http://www.UnicornHRO.com .
About ExpenseWatch ( http://www.ExpenseWatch.com )
ExpenseWatch automates manual, time consuming paper-based processes, for visibility and control over organizational spending, empowering customers to spend with confidence. Modules for expense reporting, purchasing and payable invoices (bills) resolve specific spending issues, or can be combined to provide a comprehensive spend management suite. The company was founded in 2000, released the first version of its spend management service in 2003 and currently manages almost $3 billion in annual spend transactions on behalf of its customers. The company is privately held with headquarters in Plymouth Meeting, PA, a suburb of Philadelphia.
